article: u.n. secretary-general kofi annan wednesday strongly condemned the murders by `` rampaging militia members '' in west timor , indonesia , and declared the security situation in that region to be `` unacceptable , '' a u.n. spokesman said .
abstract: u.n. chief strongly condemns killing of three u.n. refugee workers
